My Hero Beard Oil

"My Hero" Beard Oil is a product that is produced and managed by the family of the late Lloyd Eugene "JR" Roberts, Jr. Lloyd passed away in 2021 after coming down with COVID-19 in 2021. In his honor, like the product label suggests, this product was made with love and care.

Lloyd and Renee are a power couple from Stray Branch in Jackson, KY. They have an inspirational romance as they are more than partners; they are best friends and soul mates. Even now, Lloyd has an everlasting effect on his family. He inspires honesty, hard work, faithfulness, and assertiveness.

Lloyd's Family

This product, and more, can be purchased at Petals, Flowers, & Home, or at Studio 6 Salon.
